Description:
Driven to create unique home-grown food concepts that bring people together, the Independent Food Company is a UAE-based hospitality company with multiple concepts under its umbrella – SALT, Switch, Parker’s, Grind, Somewhere, and Public.Receiving deliveries and verifying that all ordered items have been delivered and are of good quality.
Understanding the necessary meal ingredients and preparing them using the best practices for a perfect meal.
Adhering to the instructions of the Chef de partie, preparing salads and sauces to satisfy the customer, and modifying the recipe if required.
Keeping track of low or depleted kitchen supplies and requesting additional requirements after consulting senior professionals.Skills
Skills: We are looking for experienced Commis Chefs to join the amazing back-of-house teams at our restaurants throughout the UAE as well as our Central Kitchen sites. As a Commis Chef you are responsible for the preparation of food, supporting the team of chefs in the kitchen, and playing an important role in the overall successful delivery of quality food.

To be considered for this role we require previous experience working in a busy kitchen, whether with a high-volume catering group or a busy independent restaurant. Strong communication skills are important as is a passion for developing a career as a chef. We will provide ongoing opportunities to support this growth.
Experience cooking with either Arabic/Lebanese cuisine or Italian/French cuisine.

Data.Company Industry: Catering, Food Service, & Restaurant; Hospitality & Accomodation
